scripts.setup: npm install && cd ./server && npm run setup && cd ../client && npm run setup
scripts.client: cd ./client && npm run setup && npm run start
scripts.server: cd ./server && npm run setup && npm run watch
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd ./server && npm run watch" "cd ./client && npm run watch"
scripts.start: cd ./server && npm run start && cd ../client && npm run start
